mapper.select: SELECT E.CLS, P.PROJECT, U.NAME, E.MODEL, E.SN, E.SPEC, E.MANU_COM, E.WAR_START, E.WAR_END, E.MAC, E.STATE FROM EQUIPMENT_USER AS EU JOIN EQUIPMENT AS E ON EU.UID = E.UID JOIN PROJECT AS P ON EU.PN = P.PN JOIN USER AS U ON EU.PN = U.PN WHERE U.STATE != 'OUT' AND TRIM(U.NAME) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') AND TRIM(P.PROJECT) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{project},'%') ORDER BY U.EMAIL, P.PROJECT

SELECT E.CLS, P.PROJECT, U.NAME, E.MODEL, E.SN, E.SPEC, E.MANU_COM, E.WAR_START, E.WAR_END, E.MAC, E.STATE FROM EQUIPMENT_USER AS EU JOIN EQUIPMENT AS E ON EU.UID = E.UID JOIN PROJECT AS P ON EU.PN = P.PN JOIN USER AS U ON EU.PN = U.PN WHERE U.STATE != 'OUT' AND E.CLS = #{cls} AND TRIM(U.NAME) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') AND TRIM(P.PROJECT) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{project},'%') ORDER BY U.EMAIL, P.PROJECT
mapper.update: update equipment_user set pn=(select pn from user where name=#{name}) where uid=#{uid}
